thread.title: Sabres place Donovan on waivers to demote him to AHL
thread.title_full: Sabres place Donovan on waivers to demote him to AHL

author: wtopstaff
title: Sabres place Donovan on waivers to demote him to AHL
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » Sabres place Donovan on… Sabres place Donovan on waivers to demote him to AHL By The Associated Press October 13, 2015 6:42 pm 
BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) — The Buffalo Sabres placed defenseman Matt Donovan on waivers Tuesday and returned rookie defenseman Brendan Guhle to his Canadian junior team. 
Donovan will be assigned to the Sabres’ American Hockey League affiliate in Rochester if he clears waivers Wednesday. The three-year NHL veteran was a healthy scratch for Buffalo’s first three games. He signed with the Sabres in free agency in July. 
Guhle was re-assigned to Prince Albert of the Western Hockey League after recovering from an upper-body injury sustained in a preseason game against Toronto two weeks ago. The 18-year-old was Buffalo’s second-round pick in the June draft. 
The Sabres (1-2) are coming off a 4-2 win over Columbus on Monday. They open a two-game trip at Florida on Thursday night. Topics:
